    • Constructor Detail

      • SpongeConfigurateManager

        protected SpongeConfigurateManager()
        Provides the given FileType to the super type ConfigurateManager. And registers any custom TypeSerializer types to TypeSerializers.getDefaultSerializers().@param fileType The file type to be used when mapping.
